content.text:
# 2001 Colonial Classic – Draw

Andre Agassi
| runner =  Yevgeny Kafelnikov
| score = 6–3, 3–6, 6–3
| type = no
| after_name = Commonwealth Bank International
}}
Andre Agassi was the defending champion, and won in the final 6–3, 3–6, 6–3, against Yevgeny Kafelnikov.
Players
Marat Safin (first round, withdrew due to an elbow injury)
#  Pete Sampras (first round, seventh place)
#  Yevgeny Kafelnikov (final, second place)
#  Andre Agassi (champion, first place)
#  Juan Carlos Ferrero (semifinals, third place)
#  Patrick Rafter (first round, fifth place)
#  Nicolas Kiefer (first round, eighth place)
#  Nicolas Escudé (semifinals, fourth place)
#  Nicolás Lapentti (replaced Marat Safin, sixth place)
}}
